thread.title: Cebu bets join Milo finals
thread.title_full: Cebu bets join Milo finals | mb.com.ph | Philippine News

author: October 11, 2015
title: Cebu bets join Milo finals
text:
October 11, 2015 Noel Tillor and Ruffa Sorongon became the latest runners to earn slots in the National Finals after winning the Cebu City leg of the 39th National Milo Marathon yesterday.
Tillor crossed the finish line at one hour, 14 minutes and 46 seconds to win the men’s category while the Davao-based Sorongon ruled the distaff side at 1:29:05.
Both earned the top purse of P10,000 and will compete in the National Finals slated Dec. 6 in Angeles City, Pampanga.
At stake in the National Finals are the Marathon King and Marathon Queen awards aside from having the opportunity to join the prestigious Boston Marathon.
Narceso Deterala and Adonis Singson placed second and third in the men’s side at 1:16:36 and 1:17:29, respectively, even as Miscelle Gilbuena (1:32:04) and Lizane Abella earned podium finishes in the women’s category.
About 24,000 runners competed in the Cebu City leg. The remaining legs are slated Oct. 18 in General Santos City, Nov. 8 in Davao, Nov. 15 in Butuan and Nov. 22 in Cagayan De Oro.
